LanguageData.Bestigor.title: big horned
LanguageData.Bestigor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] horns show that [PAWN_nameDef] belongs to the stronger ones. Larger horns are carried with pride, proof that you are blessed with strength and stand above the lesser kind.
LanguageData.GorTurned.title: mutant
LanguageData.GorTurnedRich.title: mutant
LanguageData.GorRaider.title: raider
LanguageData.GorRaider.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is cut from the same cloth as the rest of the herd.
LanguageData.GorThrall.title: thrall
LanguageData.GorThrall.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] performs menial task for the herd.
LanguageData.GorShaman.title: shaman
LanguageData.GorShaman.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] took up the reins of shaman for the herd..
LanguageData.GorGrunt.title: grunt
LanguageData.GorGrunt.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is average rough and vile Gor.
LanguageData.GorWild.title: wildling
LanguageData.GorWild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a gor to a human family. Left in the wilds like so many other mutant children. Picked up by a nearby gor herd that heard the mutant child calling.
LanguageData.GorShamanChild.title: shaman
LanguageData.GorShamanChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] "studied" under one of the bray-shamans of the herd.
LanguageData.GorStrange.title: strange gor
LanguageData.GorStrange.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a mutant. Abandoned like so many other mutants [PAWN_nameDef] was left to fend for itself in a passing gor herd. [PAWN_nameDef] was a stranger than the rest of the mutant children, a mind touched by chaos throwing [PAWN_nameDef] into mania from time to time.
LanguageData.GorChild.title: farm child
LanguageData.GorChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't born as a mutant. [PAWN_nameDef] lived life as a farmers child. [PAWN_nameDef] was later in life corrupted by chaos, joining a passing gor herd.
LanguageData.GorChildRich.title: rich child
LanguageData.GorChildRich.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't born as a mutant. [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a rich family. Spending childhood studying the arts of a aristocrat. [PAWN_nameDef] was later in life corrupted by chaos, joining a passing gor herd.
